channel.title: PoKeMoN (M?)MORPG in java
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2i1kpqx.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [center][url=http://www.PoKeNation.org/forum/][b][size=14pt]www.PoKeNation.org/forum/[/size][/b][/url]
This website has been approved by Scape-JAVA.[/center]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2qjf88x.jpg[/img]
First of all this is just a side project while my serious project is the 474 with JackasauR. I got this idea when I was at University and my Programming 3 class teacher said we will need to start a project to present in February. Must be something started from scratch and everything used not done by me [B]must [/B]be in credits. I liked to play PoKeMoN a lot a few years ago, and I know theres millions of kids who would like to play a online game similar to the real GameBoy versions.
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/35l9mw1.jpg[/img]
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Client[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] -Packet Sending -Packet Handler -Login -Logout -Arrow Keys Walking -Movement -WorldMap loading (still working on it)
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Server[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] -Packet Sending -Packet Handler -Multiplayer
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Packets Client -> Server[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] -Walking
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Packets Server -> Client[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] -General Player Updating (with masks)
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Tools[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] -Map Creator/Editor (working on it)
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/18g46s.jpg[/img]
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Login Screen:[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/9ant48.jpg[/img]
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Ingame [/SIZE](WorldMap loading, logout button was a simple test ignore it)[/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2nicivn.jpg[/img]
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Multiplayer & Player Updating[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/atothl.jpg[/img]
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Names above heads[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/a2f02u.jpg[/img]
[B][COLOR=SandyBrown][SIZE=4]Map Editor[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [COLOR=Lime][B][NEW][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2ykyvsx.jpg[/img] [B][COLOR=Red][OLD][/COLOR][/B] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/24oont0.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/fe2ce1.jpg[/img]
[B]Palidino[/B] for a packet sending/handling idea

item.title: PoKeMoN (M?)MORPG in java
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]My misused, and misplaced commas makes my intelligence low? Seeing as this will go on for a while, my grammar and spelling seems better than yours.

Sure, you may now the proper rules for grammar, but at least I’m attempting. You can’t even capitalize or use punctuation regularly.

Don’t be a lazy fuck.[/quote]yes it does, and there’s a different between not knowing (‘know’ not ‘now’ as you’ve misspelled it) proper grammar and purposely not utilizing it. you actually attempt at writing with correct grammar and fail miserably, i dont; whenever i feel like it, i do make proper use of it, however. looking at my last few posts, i see the following instances:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

but yes, most of the time i am a “lazy fuck”, as you’ve termed it. better than being a complete ignoramus, at least

Read full topic

item.title: PoKeMoN (M?)MORPG in java
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Check his forum.

I personally think he was adding pokemon as he did the pokedex, as he showed no progress of in game pokemon.[/quote]
Thats what I am thinking is taking soo long. He is adding up to the Deoxy’s, so there are quite a few hundred to graph the proper stats, evolutions and such. Hopefully he will stop at a point though, and release a beta even though it wont have all pokemon. It would at least show he is progressing.

Read full topic

We haven’t even seen the codons. They are probably shit.

I love how you jump to conclusions. [/sarcasm]

Give him a chance, I doubt you could even create this.
[/quote]You shouldn’t pick challenges with people, because I bet John could program 30x better than you.

/facepalm
Depends on what language you choose.
And I didn’t say that I was better than him, I said that he was jumping to conclusions and that >> XAVES << could do better than him.[/quote]
Whether you’re correct or wrong, you shouldn’t start an argument with people.
